pullRequest.title: HIVE-23840: Use LLAP to get orc metadata
pullRequest.bodyText:
Started to use new LLAP getOrcTailFromCache
Refactored stuff to use the tail instead of the reader related things
Added some unit tests for the new smaller components

commit.message: HIVE-23840: Use LLAP to get orc metadata

nodes.bodyText: We could spare the deserialization of MapWork from JobConf here, if we pass the MapWork instance already present in LlapRecordReader to VectorizedOrcAcidRowBatchReader ctor. (Downside is that in turn we would need to adjust the other ctor's of VectorizedOrcAcidRowBatchReader too)
Initialized to true on purpose for now? If not, I don't see it getting set to false.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -129,6 +137,16 @@
    */
   private SearchArgument deleteEventSarg = null;
 
+  /**
+   * Cachetag associated with the Split
+   */
+  private final CacheTag cacheTag;
+
+  /**
+   * Skip using Llap IO cache for checking delete_delta files if the configuration is not correct
+   */
+  private static boolean skipLlapCache = true;

nodes.bodyText: nit: comment could be more verbose, like: Reader can be reused if it was created before: only for non-LLAP cache cases, otherwise we need to create it here

commit.message: Addressing Adam's comments, and test failures

Fixed test failures - prepared the stuff for multi statement transactions.
Also fix some minor formatting/niceity issues
